message:
Empty line should be followed by

tag on the next line.

Empty line should be followed by

tag on the next line.

Empty line should be followed by

tag on the next line.
'package' should be separated from previous statement.
Using the '.*' form of import should be avoided - org.junit.Assert.*.
Wrong lexicographical order for 'ai.idylnlp.model.entity.Entity' import. Should be before 'org.junit.Test'.
Wrong lexicographical order for 'ai.idylnlp.nlp.entity.sanitizers.DefaultEntitySanitizer' import. Should be before 'org.junit.Test'.
WhitespaceAround: 'for' is not followed by whitespace. Empty blocks may only be represented as {} when not part of a multi-block statement (4.1.3)
